name: dalila-property-management
description: Full-stack property management system with React frontend, PHP API, and admin panel

scripts.predev: cp .env.local fe/.env.local && cp .env.local admin/.env.local && grep -E '^(DB_|JWT_)' .env.local > api/.env.local
scripts.dev: npm run docker:up && concurrently "npm run dev:fe" "npm run dev:admin"
scripts.docker:up: docker-compose up -d && echo '⏳ Waiting for services...' && sleep 10
scripts.docker:rebuild: docker-compose down && docker-compose build --no-cache && docker-compose up -d && echo '⏳ Waiting for services...' && sleep 10
scripts.db:init: docker exec -it dalila-mysql mysql -udalila_user -p${MYSQL_PASSWORD} dalila_db < BE/database/init.sql
scripts.db:reset: npm run docker:restart && sleep 5 && npm run db:init
scripts.deploy:prepare:
npm run build && echo '
✅ Build completato! Carica questi file su FTP:

  fe/dist/ → new-site/fe/
  admin/dist/ → new-site/admin/
  api/ → new-site/api/
  .env.example → new-site/.env (configuralo sul server!)
'

author: Dalila Real Estate
